article_title: Get informed on the top stories of the day in one quick scan

article_content: Good morning  This is our daily news roundup with everything you need to know in one concise read  Sign up here to get this delivered to your inbox every morning How sick Canadian travellers are masking COVID 19 symptoms to get through airport screening Ca   8115 chars
